attributes.action: Helping to recongize disability and speical needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition for you to sign if you belive that all children at secondary school should be taught about special needs and disability. We feel this should be done as there is a increase of people unaware and no knowledge of disability/special needs. As a result people who have a disability/special needs are being bullied, discriminated and intimidated. If this succedss this will be a big step to put a end of discrimination
